methods.name: findSimilar
methods.description: Returns a list of similar ideas based on the title of the specified idea.

methods.name: getAllRecentReplies
methods.signature: public static ID[] getAllRecentReplies(String userID, String communityID)
methods.description: Returns ideas that have recent replies for the specified user or zone. This includes all read and unread replies.

methods.name: getReadRecentReplies
methods.signature: public static ID[] getReadRecentReplies(String userID, String communityID)
methods.description: Returns ideas that have recent replies marked as read.

methods.name: getUnreadRecentReplies
methods.signature: public static ID[] getUnreadRecentReplies(String userID, String communityID)
methods.description: Returns ideas that have recent replies marked as unread.

methods.name: markRead
methods.description: Marks all comments as read for the user that is currently logged in.
